title: Randi Rhodes Show - June 21 2010
description:
This weekend the President spent his weekly radio address blasting the Republicans for obstructionism, including a Senate filibuster of an extension to unemployment benefits. Senate Republicans are holding unemployed people hostage - which is about as close as the Republicans in the Senate are going to get to giving any of them permanent positions. Thanks to Republican obstructionism, 325,000 workers have already had their unemployment benefits cut off. The Senate Republicans donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t seem to grasp the difference between ending unemployment, and ending unemployment benefits.

At least Senate hopeful Rand Paul has an answer to long-term unemployment: go get crappy jobs. I donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t know the answer to long term unemployment, but I do know that a good start would be to make sure Rand Paul does not get a job as US Senator. Paul says lazy Americans need to take lower paying jobs. Thanks for the minimum wage job, Rand. My only question for you now is ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œDo you want to supersize that?ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ I have some advice to Rand Paul - go back to talking about how you want to repeal the Civil Rights Act. The only way this event could have been more tasteless and wrong would be if Tony Hayward had done it in blackface. Tony, if you really want your life back, stop reminding people of just how disconnected it is from the lives of normal people.
